article_title: Obamacare Essentials for Small Business Owners – Clip 22
article_text: Blue Cross Blue Shield Senior Vice President for Markets Kevin Cassidy offers three considerations for small business owners who want to choose the best possible health insurance plan for themselves and their employees. Once employers understand the premium cost they can afford, what kind of coverage they want and which doctors and hospitals they want to access, making a decision will be that much easier.
